title: Hair Dryer Holder, Hairdryer Holder Wall Mounted for Bathroom, Stainless Steel Hairdryer Holder Station Adhesive or Drilling Installation, Hair Dryer Holder Wall Mount Waterproof for Barbershop UEMUSI
features: ‚úÖ„ÄêSmart Design & Perfect Compatibility„Äë The UEMUSI hair dryer holder is suitable for 99% hair dryers. Our hairdryer holder features a hook for organising power cords, allowing you to keep your workspace tidy. (hair dryer is NOT included)

‚úÖ„ÄêExquisite Workmanship and Superior Quality„Äë Premium 304 stainless steel with excellent anti-rust, non-deforming performance and top-grade workmanship combine to deliver an excellent hairdryer holder wall mounted for your hair dryer.

‚úÖ„ÄêInnovative Organizer„Äë The new upgraded PVC pad on the blower bracket can prevent the hairdryer from scratching. The raised corners on both sides prevent the blow dryer from slipping and falling.

‚úÖ„Äê2 Way Installation„Äë Our hairdryer holder station offers versatile installation options. This hair dryer stand can be securely attached using the 3M adhesives on the back or traditionally installed with screws. Enjoy the flexibility of two installation methods based on your preference. (Adhesive installation is NOT suitable for wallpapers, painted walls, rough surfaces, or concrete walls)

‚úÖ„ÄêWhat You Get„Äë Premium UEMUSI‚Äôs hair dryer holder, installation pack, welcome guide, and friendly customer service. (üåüNote:If you encounter any initial defects, please reach out to us promptly through "Order History" - "Contact Seller" for resolution.)
description: Product Description Made of Premium 304 Stainless Steel with Thoughful Details 2 installation methods: Self-adhesive & Traditional Drilling Traditional Drilling (Suitable for all surfaces): Put the holder on the wall and mark the hole positions. Drill holes in the wall according to the markings. Hole diameter: slightly larger than the diameter of the plastic anchors Hammer the plastic anchors into the holes. Align the screws with the holes, and pass them through the metal washer. Tighten the screws to secure the blow dryer holder to the wall. Cover the screws with the screw caps. - Self - Adhesion: Clean the surface and dry it. For new ceramic tile, wipe it clean with alcohol. (Make sure the surface is smooth, such as ceramic tile, metal surface, glasses, etcÔºâ Tear off the protective film behind, do not touch the adhesive liner. Stick the holder to the desired place and press firmly for about 30 seconds. Rest it for 24 hours to ensure better sticking. After 24 hours, you may start to use it. Remove tips: Heat the adhesive area with a hair dryer for 3 minutes, then gradually scrape off the heated adhesive tape with a blade without damaging the surface.
